title: Need locate this fonts!
content:
Hi there!

I need locate which fonts are this!  
I know they are basic but I need that they be exactly same.  
I think that there are 2 kind of fonts in that picture.  
I have try WHATFONTIS yet :(

Please, help me!

Thank you all ^^

P.S. here is the pictures:  
-\> [http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/greygirlbeast/2853715/10846/10846\_origina...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150012/http:/ic.pics.livejournal.com/greygirlbeast/2853715/10846/10846_original.jpg "http://ic.pics.livejournal.com/greygirlbeast/2853715/10846/10846\_original.jpg")  
-\> [http://www.welovefine.com/4471-innsmouth-academy-66.html#.U68mHfl\_u5Q](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150012/http:/www.welovefine.com/4471-innsmouth-academy-66.html#.U68mHfl_u5Q "http://www.welovefine.com/4471-innsmouth-academy-66.html#.U68mHfl\_u5Q")

Font: 

 College by Matthew Welch 

Solved By:

author: ChiliCookie

comments.content:
Looks like a condensed version of Sporting Life:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/sporting-life/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150012/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/sporting-life/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/sporting-life/")

Yes! yes! I think this is exactly the number's font!  
Done! With the name of this font I'll try to find a free one

Thanks kthomps5!

Ok, thanks to you I could find the exactly same fonts!  
 [http://www.dafont.com/college.font?text=sport](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317150012/http:/www.dafont.com/college.font?text=sport "http://www.dafont.com/college.font?text=sport")

'College by Matthew Welch'

Thank you both ^^
